item.title: Minneapolis live updates: Stephen Miller says CBP may not have followed protocol
item.description: The Trump administration is grappling with the fallout from the Minneapolis shooting.

item.title: LIVE: Sec. Rubio testifies before Congress on Venezuela: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: WATCH: Connecticut aquarium welcomes 2 endangered penguin chicks
item.description: The Mystic Aquarium in Connecticut is calling the hatching of the critically endangered African penguins a “hopeful milestone.”

item.title: WATCH: DHS sends initial report on Alex Pretti killing to Congress
item.description: New details have emerged in the killing of Alex Pretti by federal agents in Minneapolis. ABC News' Matt Rivers reports.

item.title: Trump hints at 'more relaxed' federal tactics in Minnesota after shootings
item.description: President Donald Trump previewed a "more relaxed" approach from federal agents operating in Minnesota following three shootings in Minneapolis.
